definitions: Extending outward beyond something else; protruding.
Forecasting or estimating something based on present trends or data.
Presenting or promoting a particular image or impression.
Causing a beam of light or image to fall on a surface.
Transferring one's own undesirable feelings or qualities onto another person.
examples: The balcony is projecting over the street.
They are projecting a significant increase in sales.
She is projecting an air of confidence.
The projector is projecting the film onto the screen.
He is projecting his insecurities onto his colleagues.
